summary: Louis (Gaspard Ulliel), a terminally ill writer, returns home after a long absence to tell his family that he is dying.
cast: Nathalie Baye|Vincent Cassel|Marion Cotillard|Léa Seydoux|Gaspard Ulliel|Antoine DesRochers|William Boyce Blanchette|Sasha Samar|Arthur Couillard|Patricia Tulasne|Emile Rondeau|Théodore Pellerin|Jenyane Provencher
title: Solo el fin del mundo
